title: Macaroni Server
provenance: Purchased by curator for collection from Slope Antiques at Columbus Avenue Flea Market.
description: Wide concave blade with feather-like serated edge and engraved floral ornament; handle in form of twisted stem with ball finial.
name: Macaroni Server
